VPCs.title: List VPCs
VPCs.description:
This request lists all dedicated host groups in the region. Host groups
are a collection of dedicated hosts for placement of instances. Each
dedicated host must belong to one and only one group. Host groups do not
span zones.

VPCs.title: Create VPC
VPCs.description: This request creates a new dedicated host group.

VPCs.title: Delete VPC
VPCs.description: This request deletes a new dedicated host group.
